pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dark Mode for 'ggplot2' Themes // Activate dark mode on your favorite 'ggplot2' theme with dark_mode() or use the dark versions of 'ggplot2' themes, including dark_theme_gray(), dark_theme_minimal(), and others. When a dark theme is applied, all geom color and geom fill defaults are changed to make them visible against a dark background. To restore the defaults to their original values, use invert_geom_defaults().
